name: ibm-xforce-threat-intel-feed
label: IBM X-Force Threat Intelligence Feed
description: IBM X-Force Threat Intelligence Feed is a preconfigured set of intelligence feeds that STAXX users can access immediately upon download, and which offers indicators and insights spanning threat categories you need to secure your business. This connector facilitates automated interactions, such as returning the list of public, private, and shared collection resources to which the user has access, returning general information for a specific object of a specific collection, etc.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: URL of IBM X-Force Threat Intelligence Feed server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: API Key
fields.name: api_key
fields.description: The API key that is configured for your account to access the IBM X-Force Threat Intelligence Feed APIs.

fields.title: API Password
fields.name: api_password
fields.description: The API password that is configured for your account to access the IBM X-Force Threat Intelligence Feed APIs.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get API Root Information
operations.description: Retrieves information containing title, description, TAXII versions, and maximum size of the content body for the specified TAXII server from IBM X-Force Threat Intelligence Feed.

operations.title: Get Collections
operations.description: Retrieves a list of public/private/shared collection resources to which the users have access from IBM X-Force Threat Intelligence Feed, based on the collection ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Collection ID
parameters.name: collectionID
parameters.tooltip: The ID of the collection whose general information you want to retrieve from IBM X-Force Threat Intelligence Feed
parameters.description: The ID of the collection whose general information, such as ID, Title, Description, Can Read, Can Write, Media Types, etc. you want to retrieve from IBM X-Force Threat Intelligence Feed.

operations.title: Get Objects By Collection ID
operations.description: Retrieves all available objects from a collection to which the users have access from IBM X-Force Threat Intelligence Feed, based on the collection ID and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Collection ID
parameters.name: collectionID
parameters.tooltip: The ID of the collection whose general information you want to retrieve from IBM X-Force Threat Intelligence Feed
parameters.description: The ID of the collection whose information such as ID, Title, Description, Can Read, Can Write, Media Types, etc. you want to retrieve from IBM X-Force Threat Intelligence Feed.

parameters.title: Created After
parameters.name: added_after
parameters.tooltip: Specify the starting DateTime, which is used to filter the result set to include only the items added after the specified DateTime.
parameters.description: Specify the starting DateTime, which is used to filter the result set to include only the items added after the specified DateTime.

parameters.title: Created Before
parameters.name: added_before
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ending DateTime, which is used to filter the result set to include only the items added before the specified DateTime.
parameters.description: Specify the ending DateTime, which is used to filter the result set to include only the items added before the specified DateTime.

parameters.title: Process Response As
parameters.name: output_mode
options: Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR
parameters.value: Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR
parameters.tooltip: The Feed Data can either be returned as a JSON; written to a file on the FortiSOAR server; or Created as Feed Records in FortiSOAR
parameters.description: Select the method of returning the Feed Data information. You can choose between the data being create as Feed records in FortiSOAR or returned in the JSON format (Return as a JSON) or being written to a file on the FortiSOAR server (Save to File). If you choose the 'Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR' option, then in Record Creation Playbook IRI field, specify the IRI of the Create Record playbooks IRI, else if if you choose 'Save to File' option, then in the Filename field, specify the name of the file in which you want to save the feed information retrieved from IBM X-Force.

Save to File.title: Filename
Save to File.name: filename
Save to File.tooltip: The file will be created under /tmp

operations.description: Generates output schema for other actions based on the input configuration
operations.title: Get Output Schema
Get Object By Object ID
operations.description: Retrieves general information for a specific object of a specific collection from IBM X-Force Threat Intelligence Feed, based on the collection ID and object ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Collection ID
parameters.name: collectionID
parameters.tooltip: The ID of the collection that contains the object you want to retrieve from IBM X-Force Threat Intelligence Feed.
parameters.description: The ID of the collection that contains the object you want to retrieve from IBM X-Force Threat Intelligence Feed.

parameters.title: Object ID
parameters.name: objectID
parameters.tooltip: The ID of the object you want to retrieve from IBM X-Force Threat Intelligence Feed.
parameters.description: The ID of the object you want to retrieve from IBM X-Force Threat Intelligence Feed.

operations.title: Get Manifest By Collection ID
operations.description: Retrieves manifest information about all available objects to which the users have access from IBM X-Force Threat Intelligence Feed, based on the collection ID and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Collection ID
parameters.name: collectionID
parameters.tooltip: The ID of the collection whose manifest information you want to retrieve from IBM X-Force Threat Intelligence Feed.
parameters.description: The ID of the collection whose manifest information you want to retrieve from IBM X-Force Threat Intelligence Feed.

parameters.title: Created After
parameters.name: added_after
parameters.tooltip: Specify the starting DateTime, which is used to filter the result set to include only the items added after the specified DateTime.
parameters.description: Specify the starting DateTime, which is used to filter the result set to include only the items added after the specified DateTime.

parameters.title: Created Before
parameters.name: added_before
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ending DateTime, which is used to filter the result set to include only the items added before the specified DateTime.
parameters.description: Specify the ending DateTime, which is used to filter the result set to include only the items added before the specified DateTime.
